title: Shachou, Battle no Jikan Desu!
synopsis: Long ago, a goddess descended from Heaven and blessed the desolate land of Gatepia. As a result, gigantic gates appeared, leading to dungeons abundant in "kirakuri," crystals containing the energy needed for the foundation of the world. This led to the formation of various companies of adventurers who would harvest kirakuri from the dungeons.
voices: ['Horie, Shun', 'Ichinose, Kana', 'Waki, Azumi', 'Aoyama, Yoshino', 'Uesaka, Sumire', 'Horie, Yui', 'Takahashi, Minami', 'Yashiro, Taku']
staff: [['Ikeshita, Hironori', ['Director']], ['Ihara, Kenta', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Ichinose, Kana', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Waki, Azumi', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
